Easy check-in and check-out process at the Hertz in the Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, especially if you have Hertz Gold Plus Rewards status. However, you do have to take a train to get to the rental car area (about 10 minutes from Terminal 3), so need to factor that into your schedule.

I had an excellent experience renting a car with the help of Raed from Hertz. He made the entire process quick and easy, providing clear information and excellent customer service. Car was ready when we arrived -- simple check-in and fast return on our departure.  Well done Hertz at Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport.

I got a rental car for the weekend and had a great experience at pickup and drop off. Rental car was as I booked online and agent was quick processing paperwork. Drop off went smooth and nothing unexpected.
